titles.title: A bill for the relief of the city of Minot, North Dakota.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Interior Department. Favorable.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with amendments. With written report No. 100-253.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 485.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 3/3/1987--Introduced. Relieves a city in North Dakota from liability for repayment of a specified sum associated with excess capacity of the Minot Pipeline resulting from enactment of the Garrison Diversion Unit Reformulation Act of 1986 (Public Law 99-294). Requires such city to reimburse the United States for such excess capacity ever actually used.
